column2: 1 for gas phase. 0 for surface phase.
column8: Potential energy from atoms.get_potential_energy() in eV
column9: Gas species only. Either monatomic, linear or nonlinear.
column10: Gas species only. Symmetry number given by DOI: 10.1007/s00214-007-0328-0
column11: Gas species only. The total electronic spin. (0 for molecules in which all electrons are paired, 0.5 for a free radical with a single unpaired electron, 1.0 for a triplet with two unpaired electrons, such as O_2.)
column12: Gas species only. Path to the trajectory file
